content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Structure Description:
- Total Blocks: 7 building blocks
- Total Layers: 4 distinct layers

## Spatial Arrangement:
1. Bottom Layer: Two red arch blocks positioned side by side
2. Second Layer: One yellow horizontal rectangular block sitting on top of the red arches
3. Third Layer: Two green vertical rectangular pillars standing on the yellow block with space between them
4. Fourth Layer: One yellow horizontal rectangular block placed across the top of the green pillars
5. Top Element: One orange triangular (roof-shaped) block centered on the top yellow block

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on careful analysis of shapes, colors, and orientations, I'll need the following blocks:
- Two red arch blocks (indices #1 and #2)
- Two yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (indices #10 and #12)
- Two green vertical rectangular pillars (indices #8 and #9)
- One orange triangular/roof block (index #15)

# Assembly Instructions

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 1
   Step2: Move block with index 2
   Step3: Move block with index 12
   Step4: Move block with index 8
   Step5: Move block with index 9
   Step6: Move block with index 10
   Step7: Move block with index 15
}
```

The assembly follows a bottom-to-top approach, starting with the foundation of red arches, adding the first yellow platform, then the green pillars, followed by the second yellow platform, and finishing with the orange triangular roof piece.
